message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a valuable product for $11,000. I believe this product will be highly beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'd like to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go above $10,000.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $9,500 is too low. How about we meet in the middle at $10,250?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $10,250 is still a bit high for me. I'd be willing to go up to $9,800, but that's my final offer.
